articles.author: David Kent
articles.title: What does Putin's latest address mean for Ireland and Europe? All you need to know from Russia - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Things are certainly tenser than they were 24 hours ago, as we wait to see whether Putin and Russia follow through with their threats.
articles.content:
Seven months on from the initial illegal invasion of Ukraine and Vladimir Putin has decided to double down.
The Russian President issued a televised address to the nation on Wednesday, in which he i… [+3341 chars]

articles.title: Gillian Chung was detained at airport in Germany because she's too pretty - The Star Online
articles.description: Apparently, the authority thought the singer-actress was entering Europe to do “illegal things”.
articles.content:
It seems being too pretty is a crime after all.
Hong Kong star Gillian Chung revealed recently that she was once detained at an airport in Germany, and the reason given was that she was young and pr… [+919 chars]

articles.title: Three EU leaders urge calm over Putin's nuclear rhetoric - Reuters
articles.description: President Vladimir Putin's latest steps in Russia's war against Ukraine show his panic and the European Union will continue supporting Kyiv, three of the bloc's leaders said on Wednesday.
